title: The Shadow Spy
description: Doug Finley is a CIA sleeper agent activated to hurry along the demise of the Soviet Union. It's a simple task: construct a money tunnel to fund the budding reform movements inside Russia. But everything escalates before Doug can finish the job, and he finds himself the target of the KGB, the Russian mob, his own CIA, and a powerful cartel who have their own plans for Russia. Doug must navigate through betrayal, treachery, bribery, man hunts and murder, only to discover he's been set up as the patsy.
author: Robert Lance
